message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can't refuse!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll give you most of it, but I'll hold on to what's left!
You're running out of options, I'm taking control!
I'm almost out of options, but I'll hold on to what's left, for now!
You're almost out of time, I'm taking the majority!
I'm running out of time, but I'll hold on to the last bit of hope!
I'm taking it all, game over!
I've given up, you win, congratulations!
